prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Pipe, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Piano, Pipe, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, Pipe, and Drums, omitting the Bass.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Guitar, Piano, Pipe, and Drums, excluding the Bass.
